hint.storageProvider: See your object storage provider’s plugin documentation
hint.fromSchedule: Use a existing schedule as template
hint.fromLatestSchedule: Create a restore from the latest successful OR partially-failed backup triggered by schedule

placeholder.existingResourcePolicy: Select a existing Resource Policy Type

tooltip.ttl: How long before the backup can be garbage collected.
tooltip.includedNamespaces: Namespaces to include in the {type}. If nothing is selected, all namespaces  are included.
tooltip.includedResources: Resources to include in the {type}, formatted as resource.group, such as storageclasses.storage.k8s.io (use '*' for all resources).
tooltip.excludedResources: Resources to exclude from the {type}, formatted as resource.group, such as storageclasses.storage.k8s.io.
tooltip.includedClusterScopedResources: Cluster-scoped resources to include in the {type}, formatted as resource.group, such as storageclasses.storage.k8s.io(use '*' for all resources).
tooltip.excludedClusterScopedResources: Cluster-scoped resources to exclude from the {type}, formatted as resource.group, such as storageclasses.storage.k8s.io.
tooltip.includedNamespaceScopedResources: Namespaced resources to include in the {type}, formatted as resource.group, such as deployments.apps(use '*' for all resources).
tooltip.excludedNamespaceScopedResources: Namespaced resources to exclude from the {type}, formatted as resource.group, such as deployments.apps.
tooltip.restoreStatusIncludedResources: Resources to include in the restore status, formatted as resource.group, such as storageclasses.storage.k8s.io.
tooltip.restoreStatusExcludedResources: Resources to exclude from the restore status, formatted as resource.group, such as storageclasses.storage.k8s.io.
tooltip.default: Sets this new location to be the new default backup storage location.
tooltip.storageLocation: Location in which to store the backup.
tooltip.volumeSnapshotLocations: List of locations (at most one per provider) where volume snapshots should be stored.
tooltip.provider: Name of the volume snapshot location provider (e.g. aws, azure, gcp).
tooltip.backupSyncPeriod: How often to ensure all Velero backups in object storage exist as Backup API objects in the cluster. Set this to 0s to disable sync.
tooltip.validationFrequency: How often to verify if the backup storage location is valid. Set this to 0s to disable sync. Default 1 minute.
tooltip.bucket: Name of the object storage bucket where backups should be stored.
tooltip.prefix: Prefix under which all Velero data should be stored within the bucket.
tooltip.certificate: File containing a certificate bundle to use when verifying TLS connections to the object store.
tooltip.accessMode: Access mode for the backup storage location.
tooltip.credentialKey: The key of the secret to select from. Must be a valid secret key.
tooltip.useOwnerReferencesInBackup: Specifies whether to use OwnerReferences on backups created by this Schedule. Notice: if set to true, when schedule is deleted, backups will be deleted too.
tooltip.skipImmediately: Skip the next scheduled backup immediately.
tooltip.paused: Specifies whether the newly created schedule is paused or not.
tooltip.schedule: A cron expression specifying a recurring schedule for this backup to run.
tooltip.namespaceMapping: Namespace mappings from name in the backup to desired restored name.
tooltip.resourcePolicy: Reference to the resource policies configmap that backup using.
tooltip.snapshotVolumes: Take snapshots of PersistentVolumes as part of the backup.
tooltip.snapshotMoveData: Specify whether snapshot data should be moved.
tooltip.defaultVolumesToFsBackup: Use pod volume file system backup by default for volumes.
tooltip.includeNamespaceClusterResources: Include namespace cluster-scoped resources in the {type}.
tooltip.csiSnapshotTimeout: How long to wait for CSI snapshot creation before timeout.
tooltip.itemOperationTimeout: How long to wait for async plugin operations before timeout.
tooltip.labelSelector: Only back up resources matching this labels selector.
tooltip.orLabelSelectors: Backup resources matching at least one of the labels selector from the list.
tooltip.datamover: Specify the data mover to be used by the backup. If the parameter is not set or set as 'velero', the built-in data mover will be used
tooltip.parallelFilesUpload: Number of files uploads simultaneously when running a backup. This is only applicable for the kopia uploader
tooltip.parallelFilesDownload: The number of restore operations to run in parallel. If set to 0, the default parallelism will be the number of CPUs for the node that node agent pod is running.
tooltip.existingResourcePolicy: Restore Policy to be used during the restore workflow, can be - none or update.
tooltip.restorePVs: Whether to restore volumes from snapshots.
tooltip.preserveNodePorts: Whether to preserve nodeports of Services when restoring.
tooltip.writeSparseFiles: Whether to write sparse files during restoring volumes.
tooltip.resourceModifier: Reference to the resource modifier configmap that restore will use.
tooltip.forceDelete: Delete resource instead of creating a delete request.

error.orLabelSelectors: Or Labels Selectors is not implemented yet.

error.unauthorized: You must login to access this page.
error.sso: Unable to process login with external SSO.

notFound.title: Something's missing
notFound.description: Sorry, we can't find that page. You'll find lots to explore on the home page.

resourceNotFound.title: Resource not found
resourceNotFound.description: Sorry, we can't retrieve resource at this time.

error.unexpected: Unable to download backup content, please try again.

standalone.title: Logs are only available when Velero UI is deployed inside K8S Cluster
